plot: A glimpse into the beautiful world of Bharatnatyam; a classical South Indian dance. World renowned dance teachers Chitra & Madurai Muralidharan along with their devoted students share their experience with this divine art form.
title: Bharatnatyam: Life, Breath, Dance
plot_es: A glimpse into the beautiful world of Bharatnatyam; a classical South Indian dance. World renowned dance teachers Chitra & Madurai Muralidharan along with their devoted students share their experience with this divine art form.
plot_en: A glimpse into the beautiful world of Bharatnatyam; a classical South Indian dance. World renowned dance teachers Chitra & Madurai Muralidharan along with their devoted students share their experience with this divine art form.
